name: Outer Space Pinball
description:
Attempt at realistic - feeling 2D pinball.

Graphics, music, sound and layout are subject to change.

Feature requests, comments, constructive criticism welcome!

Controls:

left & right arrow keys(or z & /): flippers (shift does both flippers)

(I wanted to do independent L&R shifts, but Godot counts them as the same key)

up arrow key: nudge (3 quick nudges activates timer until you can nudge again)

enter/space: plunger

escape: menu

Home: rotate camera/full-screen (cabinet mode) (will be activated until new game, currently. Just hit escape and start a new game if you hate it)
